selected_skills.name: extract_side_length_from_diagram
selected_skills.purpose: To extract the side length of the square from the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to determine the side length of the square from the provided diagram image.

selected_skills.name: sympy_solve
selected_skills.purpose: To solve equations related to the geometric configuration.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to solve for x using the equations derived from the geometric properties of the square and the tangent line.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer as required.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the calculated value of x into the required answer format.

new_skill_specs.name: determine_tangency_relationship
new_skill_specs.purpose: To determine the equation representing the tangency relationship between the square and the line.
